name: REI
description: REI, a brand synonymous with performance-focused outdoor apparel, gear, and accessories, prioritizes sustainability in every aspect. Actively championing climate action and social justice, REI drives positive change through initiatives like the REI Cooperative Action Fund. This fund supports nonprofits nationwide striving for a more equitable and inclusive outdoor experience. Complementing this commitment, REI's Re/Supply program encourages a circular economy by allowing customers to trade in used outdoor gear, further amplifying the brand's dedication to environmental responsibility.

name: Reformation
description: Reformation offers sustainable yet premium women's wear, including dresses, jeans, sweaters, shoes, and accessories. With a mission to bring sustainable fashion to every part of your outfit, Reformation has achieved Climate Neutral Certification. Twenty-one percent of their materials are non-virgin, and 28% of their products are textile-to-textile recyclable. The RefRecyclable program encourages users to reuse, resell, and recycle, enhancing the brand's commitment to a circular, eco-friendly fashion cycle.

name: thredUP
description: thredUP, an online secondhand clothing marketplace, prioritizes sustainable fashion by offering vintage and thrift clothing. They provide a "fashion footprint calculator" to educate users on environmental impacts. thredUP's focus on giving items a second life has resulted in avoiding significant CO2e emissions, saving water, and conserving energy. With achievements like 666M lbs of CO2e avoided, 7B gallons of water saved, and 1.3B kWh of energy saved, thredUP contributes meaningfully to sustainable practices.

name: tentree
description: Tentree specializes in sustainable men's and women's apparel and accessories. With climate-offsetting subscription services like travel offset packages and daily offset packages, Tentree is committed to advancing sustainability across the fashion industry. Recognized for their environmental commitment, they've been Climate Neutral certified since 2020 and obtained Certified B Corp status in 2016. Tentree is active in sustainability alliances like the Restorative Coalition and is a signatory of The Fashion Charter.

name: Goodwill
description: Goodwill is a renowned thrift store chain that is a beacon of sustainable shopping. Specializing in pre-owned items, Goodwill promotes repurposing and secondhand treasures. By providing affordable, quality goods, Goodwill extends the lifecycle of products and significantly reduces waste. With a commitment to sustainability at its core, shopping at Goodwill is a meaningful way to contribute to a more eco-friendly and circular economy.

name: Savers
description: Savers, a thrift store retailer with U.S., Canada, and Australia locations since 1954, facilitates the buying and selling secondhand clothing, accessories, and home goods. As staunch reuse advocates, Savers champions sustainability by diverting unique finds from landfills. With a robust recycling and upcycling program, the brand actively supports the circular economy, ensuring that your clothing resale or purchase contributes to environmental protection and community support.

name: Plato's Closet
description: Plato's Closet, a leading U.S. chain, promotes sustainability at its core by specializing in secondhand fashion. It curates vintage and thrifted clothing through a consignment model, reducing textile waste and fostering a circular fashion economy. Plato's Closet is committed to providing an eco-friendly and affordable approach to wardrobe choices that aligns with responsible and sustainable practices.

name: Vuori
description: Vuori is an apparel and accessories brand specializing in activewear and performance clothing. Since 2019, they've offset their plastic footprint via CleanHub and achieved Climate Neutral certification. Vuori integrates recycled, low-impact materials when feasible and advocates re-selling for prolonged product use, reflecting their commitment to eco-friendly practices.

name: Poshmark
description: Poshmark is an online marketplace for secondhand fashion that connects users to over 200 million pre-owned items from popular brands like Nike and Lululemon.The Poshmark platform promotes sustainability through its emphasis on secondhand, thrift, and sustainable fashion choices. Poshmark enables eco-conscious shopping, reducing the environmental impact of clothing production by extending the life cycle of fashion pieces.

name: goodr
description: Goodr, known for affordable and stylish eyewear, shines in sustainability as a brand committed to 100% carbon neutrality. Offering trendy options in running sunglasses and more, Goodr demonstrates that fashion can be accessible and eco-conscious. With a focus on carbon neutrality, they make strides towards a more sustainable future, ensuring that your purchase looks good and contributes to a greener planet.

name: Sunski
description: Sunski are an eyewear brand that offers premium sunglasses for men and women. With SuperLight recycled frames, plastic-free Packaging, and Climate Neutral Certification, they exemplify eco-conscious practices. As proud members of 1% for the Planet, Sunski leads the way in providing stylish accessories with a commitment to a greener future.

name: Nisolo
description: Nisolo is a leather footwear brand, featuring a diverse product range including boots, heels, sneakers, sandals, and oxfords for both men and women. As a certified B Corp, Nisolo goes the extra mile in sustainability with Climate Neutral Certification. Notably, they provide transparency through a Sustainability Facts Label on each product, detailing scores for carbon footprint, emissions offset, raw materials, processing, manufacturing, packaging, and post-use product lifecycle.

name: Ana Luisa
description: Amtrak is the national passenger railroad company of the United States and stands out for its sustainable and progressive travel options. With over 500 destinations, Amtrak is a budget-friendly choice for cross-country travel. Notably, their train fleet, including the Amtrak Airo, strongly focuses on sustainable practices, contributing to the brand's commitment to energy-efficient and eco-friendly transportation solutions.

name: Peak Design
description: Peak Design, renowned for its bags, camera gear, and mobile cases, exemplifies sustainability in every stitch. The brand leads the way in responsible production with a fair trade certified factory and a commitment to sustainable materials. Achieving Climate Neutral Certification, Peak Design seamlessly blends style and eco-consciousness, offering products that align with a greener, fairer future.

name: Crap Eyewear
description: Crap Eyewear, a brand providing sunglasses crafted with earth-friendly, optical-grade materials, proudly holds the title of being climate neutral certified. Offering 100% UV ray protection and embodying the motto "Don't worry, be crappy," they prioritize sustainability by making sunglasses with bioacetate, a biodegradable plant-based frame material. Committed to environmental causes, they are also a proud 1% for the planet member, allocating 1% of their annual sales to support such initiatives.

name: Thrive Market
description: Thrive Market is a certified B Corp wholesaler offering healthy food from top organic brands. They emphasize non-GMO, organic, and sustainable products, including gluten-free, dairy-free, and keto options. With a commitment to being plastic-neutral, Thrive Market provides access to a curated selection of health-conscious and eco-friendly products at up to 30% off manufacturer-suggested retail price (MSRP).

name: JuneShine
description: JuneShine, a brand describing itself as an "honest brewery", specializes in sustainable alcohol, crafting hard kombucha and canned cocktails with transparent ingredients. Many offerings are gluten-free, low in sugar, and vegan, featuring natural ingredients. Achieving complete carbon neutrality, they're also proud 1% for the Planet members, donating one percent of sales to environmental nonprofits. JuneShine has furthered their commitment by partnering with Change Climate, solidifying their dedication to a sustainable and eco-conscious brewing approach.

name: Athletic Greens
description: Athletic Greens offers an all-in-one nutritional supplement featuring a science-driven blend of vitamins, minerals, good bacteria, and whole food sourced ingredients. Ideal for vegans and vegetarians, the brand has achieved two years of climate neutral certification, emphasizing its commitment to sustainable practices. Athletic Greens provides a sustainable, healthy, and clean nutritional solution for individuals seeking a comprehensive approach to well-being.

name: Blueland
description: Blueland offers reusable, refillable, plastic-free cleaning products, including dish and laundry items, soaps, and personal care products. Recognized as a Certified B Corp, Blueland has achieved Climate Neutral status and earned the distinction of being a B Corp Best for the World in 2022. Acknowledged by Oprah for their sustainability efforts, they stand out for providing top-notch, eco-friendly cleaning alternatives for a clean, sustainable lifestyle.

name: Backdrop
description: Specializing in premium paint, made-to-order wall covers, and rugs, Backdrop stands out as the first-ever Climate Neutral Certified paint brand. Selling low-VOC, Green Wise certified, and low-odor paints, all of their sustainable home design products are handcrafted in Downtown LA. With a commitment to both premium quality and environmental responsibility, Backdrop re-define sustainability in home design.

name: P.F. Candle Co.
description: P.F. Candle Co. is a Los Angeles-based brand that specializes in sustainable home fragrance products. Their extensive product range includes vegan and cruelty-free candles, reed diffusers, incense, body wash, and car fragrances and they boast over 25 unique scents. Committed to sustainability, their offerings feature non-toxic, natural ingredients, ensuring a clean and environmentally conscious home fragrance experience.

name: bookshop.org
description: Bookshop.org is an online bookstore that champions sustainability. As a B Corp Certified brand, it has raised an impressive $28 million for local, independent bookstores since 2020. Acknowledged as Climate Neutral, Bookshop.org earned Fast Company's 2021 World Changing Ideas Award, showcasing its commitment to environmentally responsible practices. With a vast selection, including crime fiction, memoirs, and kids' classics, they ensure every book purchase contributes to a more sustainable literary world.

name: Standart
description: Standart, an independent print magazine, is renowned for its dedication to the beauty of specialty coffee culture. Since its debut in 2015, it has earned titles such as the 2021, 2019, 2018, and 2017 Best Coffee Magazine by Sprudge. Operating as a fully remote entity and achieving climate neutral certification, Standart is committed to sustainability in the realm of print media.
